scripts.wesjet:build: run wesjet:clean && tsc --build base.json && yarn workspace wesjet-nextjs-plugin run prepack
scripts.wesjet:postinstall: yarn workspaces foreach --verbose --include "examples-*" exec yarn wesjet postinstall
scripts.test: CI=true VITEST_SEGFAULT_RETRY=3 yarn workspaces foreach --parallel run test
scripts.release:prerelease: yarn wesjet:build && yarn workspaces foreach --verbose --topological-dev --parallel --no-private npm publish --tolerate-republish --tag=latest
scripts.release:patch: yarn wesjet:build && yarn workspaces foreach --verbose --topological-dev --parallel --no-private npm publish --tolerate-republish
scripts.release:minor: yarn wesjet:build && yarn workspaces foreach --verbose --topological-dev --parallel --no-private npm publish --tolerate-republish
